shared_text:
LSI Foster Care and Adoption
November 7, 2019 at 9:01 AM ¬∑

National Adoption Month is the perfect time for us to remind you that there are hundreds of children in Iowa in need of happy, permanent homes. The children on LSIowa.org/meetiowakids represent just a few of them. LSI works with the Iowa Department of Human Services (DHS) to help raise awareness about Iowa children who are waiting to be adopted from foster care.

Each of the children featured on the page is legally eligible for adoption. Families who are interested in adoption must be current licensed foster families or approved adoptive families. If this is you, visit LSIowa.org/meetiowakids. Your family might be the perfect fit for an Iowa child.
